page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: {Council Housing }There are approx.1100 council houses in Maybole. The oldest stock is below the{High Street,}the newest above. The new stock is all 2/3/4 apartment with central heating suitable for tenants with families. {Sheltered Housing }There is only one sheltered housing complex,situated in {Crosne Street.}It opens onto the{High {Street}near most of the shops.This makes it easier for the old people to do their shopping without having to walk far. {Housing Maintenance}The need for this has increased due to property ageing and therefore requiring more repairs. Council tenants today also expect a higher standard of accomodation and so more repairs/upgradings are necessary. Vandalism in Maybole is limited and does not create a serious problem.
